ing: 3/4 cup almond milk, or more as needed
des: "Recipe from the Gastroparesis-Friendly Kitchen. Pumpkin has a moderate amount of fiber but may be well-tolerated in moderation, especially when pureed and thinned."
ins: Place almond milk, pumpkin puree, banana, protein powder, and pumpkin pie spice in a blender. Blend until smooth, 15 to 30 seconds. If mixture is too thick, add more almond milk or water to achieve desired consistency.
